objects.description: [Hancitor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0499) has used a macro to check that an ActiveDocument shape object in the lure message is present. If this object is not found, the macro will exit without downloading additional payloads.(Citation: FireEye Hancitor)

external_references.description: Anubhav, A., Jallepalli, D. (2016, September 23). Hancitor (AKA Chanitor) observed using multiple attack approaches. Retrieved August 13, 2020.
